long_description: Made from breathable, compressible, stretchy, high-loft Regulator(R) fleece, the women's Patagonia R2 jacket provides superior lightweight insulation on its own or under a shell. R2 Jacket traps heat and breathes freely, so it keeps you warm but not swampy on uphill approaches. Regulator fleece jacket uses a refined Polartec(R) Thermal Pro(R) polyester (63% recycled) fabric, which is super light, extremely compressible, stretchy and soft. Short-sheared but high-loft face has a smooth appearance, and the directional knit wicks superbly, speeding dry times. Polartec(R) Power Stretch(R) panels on the outer forearms and along the sides increase durability in high-wear areas and allow for a close fit while retaining warmth. Softly lined inner collar and chin flap offers next-to-skin comfort; offset shoulder seams stay clear of pack straps. Shoulder seams are set forward to reduce bulk and chafing under pack straps. One chest and two handwarmer pockets. The women's Patagonia R2 jacket has a slim fit.
short_description: Made from breathable, compressible, stretchy, high-loft Regulator(R) fleece, the women's Patagonia R2 jacket provides superior lightweight insulation on its own or under a shell.
